title: Law Street
description: Law Street is a riveting tale of sex, bribery, greed and a little mind-numbing videotape. The forces of corporate excess and abuse of power are on grand display at one of the Wall Street's premier law firms. The bar has has never been set so low in this racey late-night novel.If your life is the law, take a break from scienter and file a motion read Law Street. As always, pro bono...
author: Phil Wohl
